今でも魔法は失敗ばかりで
google_translated:
Such a thing ...
Even now magic is only a failure

en_text: There are no coincidences in this world.
jp_text:
この世に偶然なんてねえ
おめえさんは俺の相棒だ
google_translated:
Can't do anything in this world
Me-san is my partner

en_text: That's why I'm here.
jp_text:
だから俺は ここにいる
当たり前のこったろ

en_text: Don't you get it?
jp_text: 聞かなかったじゃねえかよ

en_text: Well... that's true.
jp_text: ま まあ… 確かに

en_text: The power to manipulate any weapon.
jp_text: 武器を自在に操る力… か

en_text: Let me tell you, though, it only applies to\Nitems that were made to be used as weapons.
jp_text:
言っとくがな
武器として作られたもんだけだ
google_translated:
Sincere
It is a product made as a weapon

en_text: Then, if I used you, would I be able to beat Waldo, too?
jp_text:
じゃあさ
お前を抜けば勝てるのかな？
google_translated:
Especially
Do you win if you miss you?

en_text: That depends on you.
jp_text: あのワルドにも

en_text: I only get used.
jp_text:
俺は使われるだけだ
（才人）ん…

en_text: I don't plan to end my career as just the captain of the mage knights.
jp_text:
僕は魔法衛士隊の隊長で
終わるつもりはない
google_translated:
I am the captain of the Magic East
I'm not finished

en_text: I wish to become an aristocrat influential to the country, no, to all of Halcheginia.
jp_text: いずれは国を… いや―

en_text: But... to get married all of a sudden...
jp_text: でも そんな急に結婚だなんて…

en_text: I need you, Louise.
jp_text: 僕には君が必要なんだ ルイズ
google_translated: I need you for me Louise

en_text: But, it's too sudden...
jp_text: でも急にそんなこと… あっ…

en_text: I will protect you.
jp_text: 君は僕が守ってあげるよ

en_text: Saito came from another world without knowing anything.
jp_text:
才人は異世界から
何も分からずにやってきたから
google_translated:
The talented person from a different world
He has done anything without knowing anything

en_text: Looks like your heart is already starting to belong to another person.
jp_text:
君の心に
誰かが住み始めているみたいだね
google_translated:
In your heart
It seems that someone is starting to live

en_text: No, definitely not!
jp_text:
はっ…
い… いいえ 違うの！

en_text: It's fine. I won't ask for an answer now.
jp_text: 呼び出したのも私だし 責任が…

en_text: Please listen to me, Waldo-sama!
jp_text: （ルイズ）聞いて ワルド様！

en_text: By the time this journey ends, your heart should be seeking mine.
jp_text:
（ワルド）この旅が終わるまでには
君の心は僕に傾いてるはずだからね
google_translated:
before this journey is over
You should be leaning to me

en_text: Good night, Louise.
jp_text: おやすみ ルイズ

en_text: Good night...
jp_text: お… おやすみなさい

en_text: Wait!
jp_text:
（殴る音）
（女性）えいっ！ ふんっ

en_text: Really, all I did was try to kiss.
jp_text:
まったく
キスしようとしたくらいで

en_text: Let's start this, Saito.
jp_text:
では始めようか 才人
（才人）はい

en_text: Stop this foolishness!
jp_text: バカなことは やめて！

en_text: Being an aristocrat is troublesome sometimes.
jp_text: 貴族というのは厄介でね

en_text: I won't go easy or anything, just so you know.
jp_text:
強いか弱いか それが気になると
いても立ってもいられなくなるんだ
google_translated:
Strong or weak or worried
I can not stand

en_text: You sure are-
jp_text: 素早いな さすがは…

en_text: But you are an amateur after all. You're full of openings.
jp_text: だが やはり素人 隙だらけだ
google_translated: But it is no longer the amateur

en_text: Get away, partner!
jp_text: うわあっ！

en_text: Saito, are you all right?
jp_text:
（せき込み）
（ルイズ）才人 大丈夫？

en_text: With your skills, you won't be able to beat a real mage.
jp_text:
（ワルド）
君の腕では本物のメイジに勝てない
google_translated: You can not beat real mage with your arms

en_text: In other words,
jp_text: つまり―

en_text: you won't be able to protect Louise.
jp_text: 君ではルイズを守れない
google_translated: You can not keep Louise with you

en_text: But... but what should I do?
jp_text: でも… でも私 どうしたら…

en_text: Saito...
jp_text: 才人…
